articles.title: Wir brauchen eine Pflichtversicherung gegen Elementarschäden
articles.image_title: Picture taken on July 7, 2022 shows a destroyed house in Altenburg on the banks of the river Ahr in Rhineland-Palatinate, western Germany, almost one year after the region was devastated by floods. - Western German regions of Rhineland-Palatinate and North Rhine-Westphalia were hit by catastrophic floods that killed over 180 people on July 14, 2021. As well as being the deadliest in the country's modern history, the deluges destroyed roads, bridges and thousands of homes and businesses. The mammoth reconstruction task is still ongoing. The scale of the devastation has in part been blamed on a lack of warnings to residents ahead of time, despite weather services forecasting heavy rainfall. (Photo by Ina FASSBENDER / AFP)

articles.image_title: Der Architekt Hans Kollhoff im Interview mit Welt Journalisten Rainer Haubrich in seiner kleineren Bibliothek, die meisten Bücher sind in Italien, verriet er. Kollhoff setzte mit seinem 101m hohen Kollhoff Tower am Berliner Potsdamer Platz und dem "Kollhoff-Plan“ am Alexanderplatz ein Zeichen. Er betreibt Ateliers in der Schweiz, Italien und den Niederlanden.
